ai-atk-s0403a12:2_1: They don’t have the third strength, nor is the strength of the body.
ai-atk-s0403a12:2_2: As for the sake of worldly gain, he is going back to the beginning of material possessions, thinking:
ai-atk-s0403a12:3_0: Living in the color of self-restraint
ai-atk-s0403a12:4_0: The sixth were not exhausted: these five ages, namely, the life span, and the life span, not a sixth,
ai-atk-s0403a12:6_1: (These seventh replied:) “The Community is far from the Community, he is not able to stay by himself.”
ai-atk-s0403a12:6_2: (but) if he is not able to stay in the midst of the Sangha without a group, even though he is not able to stay in the midst of the Sangha, his accompanying the advice of the Sangha, he is not able to stay in the midst of the Sangha.
ai-atk-s0403a12:6_3: (It is enough to replied:) “It is worth a fraction of the Saṅgha” and “It is worth a fourteenth part
ai-atk-s0403a12:6_4: The eighth section for recitation is finished.
ai-atk-s0403a12:8_1: The ninth kinds of people are bound for a place of loss.
ai-atk-s0403a12:8_3: While the falling away of the awakens have ceased,
ai-atk-s0403a12:8_4: (but) if he does not transgresses that don’t proceed .
ai-atk-s0403a12:9_0: The third sub-chapter on sickness is finished.
